original_title: Gary Burton & Makoto Ozone - Live in Montreaux
overview: Renowned pianist Makoto Ozone and vibraphone maestro Gary Burton have collaborated on a number of occasions both live and in the studio. This concert from the Montreux Festival in 2002 corresponded with the release of their album "Virtuosi", which combines classical music duets with jazz improvisations to stunning effect. Also included are various pieces from Gary Burtons extensive back catalog.  Tracklisting 1. Afro Blues 2. Bags Groove 3. Hole in the Wall 4. Opus Half 5. Le Tombeau De Couperin 6. Sonata K20 7. Excursions for Piano, Opus 20 8. Number 1 9. Opus 32, Prelude VIII 10. Milonga 11. Concerto in F 12. Bienvenidos Al Mundo
title: Gary Burton & Makoto Ozone - Live in Montreaux
